description.value:
This wilted rose is preserved by magic. The spell attack roll of any spell cast by Activating this item is [[/r 1d20+14 #Spell Attack Roll]]{+19}, and the spell DC is 29.

  • Armor You gain resistance 10 to acid and attacks by demons.
  • Weapon After you cast an acid spell by Activating the wilting rose, your Strikes with the weapon deal an additional @Damage[1d8[acid]] damage until end of your next turn.
